mapper.sql:
FROM member a WHERE 1=1
AND DelNy = 0 AND DelNy = 1 AND nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND dob LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.nm ,a.id ,a.password ,a.email ,a.dob ,a.reserve ,a.DelNy ,a.memberRegDate ,a.memberGender ,(select tel from member_tel aa where 1=1 and aa.tel_defaultNy = 1 and a.seq = aa.member_seq) as phonenum
ORDER BY a.seq DESC

SELECT a.seq ,a.nm ,a.id ,a.password ,a.email ,a.dob ,a.reserve ,a.DelNy ,a.memberRegDate ,a.memberGender ,(select tel from member_tel aa where 1=1 and aa.tel_defaultNy = 1 and a.seq = aa.member_seq) as phonenum FROM member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET DelNy = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq }
